_meta.description: Identification perspective - Tests: comparison, radar, bar, range, text, list, image

description: Medium to large mushroom with olive-green to yellowish-green cap, white gills, white stem with faint greenish tinge, prominent ring, and cup-like volva at base

cap_characteristics.color: Olive-green to yellowish-green, sometimes pale or white
cap_characteristics.surface: Smooth, slightly sticky when wet, often with radial fibers
cap_characteristics.shape: Convex when young, flattening with age, often with slight umbo

microscopic_features: Spores broadly ellipsoid to subglobose, 8-11 × 7-9 µm, amyloid, smooth, white in mass
chemical_tests: Cap tissue turns wine-red with concentrated H2SO4. Meixner test positive for amatoxins.
critical_warning: DEADLY POISONOUS. Responsible for 90% of mushroom fatalities. All parts toxic. No safe preparation method exists.
